generated_text:
- road: The wet asphalt surface in the foreground and extending into the distance is a road.
- sidewalk: The paved path with red and white bollards is a sidewalk, separated from the road by the bollards.
- building: The multi-story residential buildings in the background and the white building on the right are buildings.
- vegetation: The trees and bushes visible throughout the image are vegetation.
- terrain: The grassy areas around the sidewalk and buildings are terrain.
- sky: The overcast sky visible above the buildings and trees is sky.
- car: The dark brown Mini Cooper parked on the right side of the road is a car. The black SUV partially visible on the left is also a car.
- pole: The red and white bollards along the sidewalk are poles.
- traffic sign: The sign mounted on a pole on the left side of the image is a traffic sign.
